item.description:
Don't want to miss this one!!! $12.00 advanced. $15.00 at the door
www.danceworcester.net

Boston's Best Tribute to the Early Days of Rock-n-Roll! This 5 piece band pays homage to the golden- throated, guitar slinging pioneers of rock-n-roll, focusing on much of the pre-Vegas Elvis era, as well as many of The King's compatriots, like Carl Perkins, Bill Hayley, and Jerry Lee Lewis, to name a few.

Ever thumb through the Want-Advertiser looking for a used automobile and stumble upon those ads with the side note - "great for parts?" Velvet Elvis is just that - the sum of extremely salvageable parts from classic Boston area bands, welded together to create one finely tuned, well oiled Roots Rock/Rockabill Rock. Rich Bartlett, of The Fools fame, provides the V-6string engine that gets the audience rockin' from 0-60 in seemingly zero time.
Jimmy Rogers is the aftermarket flare that customizes the style and energy of what is known as Velvet Elvis - Boston's Best Tribute to Elvis and the Pioneers of Rock and Roll.


Directions:

From Mass. Pike: Take exit 10 (Auburn). Follow signs to Route 290 East, then continue as follows...

From Route 290 East: (from Auburn): Take exit 22 - at end of ramp, take a LEFT. Go about .2 of a mile to a light. Take a LEFT onto N. Quinsigamond Ave, and proceed 1.9 miles to MAIRONIS PARK â€“ it will be on your right, set back from the road.

From Route 290 West (from Hudson/Marlboro): Take exit 22 - at end of ramp take a RIGHT. Go .1 of a mile
to a light. Take a LEFT onto N. Quinsigamond Avenue, and proceed 1.9 miles to MAIRONIS PARK - it will be on your right, set back from the road.

NOTE: Maironis Park is next to White City Shopping Plaza (south of Route 9).
item.how_to_find_us: Look for tables with meetup signs.
item.name: Velvet Elvis Band
